import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Carousel, Accordion, Form, Modal, ProgressBar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function HomePage() { const [showContactModal, setShowContactModal] = useState(false); const [statsAnimated, setStatsAnimated] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('visible'); if (entry.target.classList.contains('stats-section')) { setStatsAnimated(true); } } }); }); const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.scroll-fade-in'); elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el)); }, []); return ( <> {/* Hero Section - Interactive Particle Background with Split-Screen */}

ExamiVana: Revolutionize Online Examinations

Empower educators and students with secure, interactive, and intelligent assessment tools.
{/* About Section - Glassmorphism Card with Reveal Animation */}

About ExamiVana

ExamiVana is a cutting-edge platform designed for seamless online exams, combining security, ease, and innovation.

 {/* How It Works Section - Interactive Flip Cards */}

How It Works

Simple steps to get started with ExamiVana.
1. Register
Sign up as a teacher or student and set up your profile.
2. Create/Take Exam
Teachers create exams; students join with a code.
3. Get Results
Auto-grade and view scores instantly.
{/* Features Section - Accordion with Expandable Cards */}

Why Choose ExamiVana?

Trusted by institutions worldwide for seamless, professional exam management.

 Secure & Compliant JWT authentication, encrypted data, and deadline enforcement ensure integrity and privacy. Smart Timers & Auto-Grading Real-time countdowns, auto-submit, and instant scoring with detailed remarks. Integrated Communication Private chat between teachers and students for support and feedback. Advanced Analytics Track performance, generate reports, and gain insights into exam trends. {/* Stats Section - Animated Counters with Progress Bars */}

0

Exams Conducted

0

Partner Institutions

0

Uptime Guarantee

0

Expert Support
{/* Pricing Section - 3D Hover Cards */}

Pricing Plans

Choose the plan that fits your needs.

 Free $0/month
Basic features, up to 10 exams. Pro $19/month
Advanced features, unlimited exams. Enterprise $49/month
Custom solutions for institutions. {/* Testimonials Section - Floating Carousel */}

What Our Users Say

"ExamiVana transformed our assessment process. It's professional, reliable, and user-friendly."

Dr. Emily Carter, University Dean

"As a student, the seamless experience and instant feedback are game-changers."

Alex Johnson, Graduate Student

"The auto-grading and chat features make it stand out from other platforms."

Prof. Michael Lee, Educator
 {/* Partners Section - Rotating Logos with Hover Effects */}

Trusted by Leading Institutions
{/* Video Demo Section - Embedded with Overlay */}

See ExamiVana in Action

Watch our demo video to understand how it works.

 {/* Newsletter Section - Interactive Form */}

Stay Updated

Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest features and tips.

 {/* Contact Section - Full-Screen Modal Trigger */}

Contact Us

Have questions? Get in touch!

 {/* FAQ Section - Collapsible with Icons */}

Frequently Asked Questions

 How secure is ExamiVana? ExamiVana uses JWT authentication, encrypted data, and deadline enforcement to ensure exam integrity and privacy. Can I take exams on mobile? Yes, ExamiVana is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile and PC devices. What if I miss the deadline? Exams are inaccessible after the deadline, and students will see a message indicating the exam is no longer available. Is there a free trial? Yes, sign up for the Free plan to try basic features with up to 10 exams. How does auto-grading work? Our system automatically scores MCQ exams and provides remarks based on performance (Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor). {/* Contact Modal - Full-Screen Interactive Form */} setShowContactModal(false)} size="lg" centered> Contact Us
Name Email Message
); } export default HomePage;
